text: 21|87|dunnunineyum (orkkuka.) addeham kupitanayi peayikkalanna sandarbham. nam orikkalum addehattin nerukkamuntakkukayillenn addeham dhariccu. anantaram iruttukalkkullil ninn addeham viliccuparannu: niyallate yatearu daivavumilla. ni etra parisud'dhan! tirccayayum nan akramikalute kuttattil pettavanayirikkunnu
